channel.title: Today, I made something neat
channel.description:
[img]http://runedatabase.co.uk/nr/villagespawner1.png[/img]
Yeah! I used like 10x64 cobble with EVil_ and have made a epic mob spawner which doesn't kill them yet! (Waiting for pistons so I can have an evil control room and hit buttons such as: Lava mobs, drowned mobs, crush mobs, and so on.
Very pretty.
Also forgive my inability to crop, it's late and I'll probably do it tomorrow.

item.title: Today, I made something neat
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Inspired by tom’s method of spawning and a guy near spawn’s method of killing, I made an excellent mob spawner (my first that worked) right outside my fortress today with toms help. It works great.

Which I have now copied exactly, and added pistons and soon to have an option to change the method of killing mobs.

i.e method one drowning (default) then the water which drowns them (which is almost fully controlled by pistons) will be halted and the floor will be removed with sticky pistons so they die from height and I collect their drops.

edit: decided to just make it a height killer, almost done now (been on all night, and now all morning doing it…)

edit2: changed my mind again, I’ve made my mind up now (3 hours later…) I’m going to edit the original concept.

Read full topic

item.title: Today, I made something neat
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:405359”]So the rooms are exactly 9x9?

  • is wall

is floor

++++++++++
+########+
+########+
+########+
+###  ###+
+###  ###+
+########+
+########+
+########+
++++++++++

To make it symmetrical, here the walls are 10x10 and the floor 8x8, how did you do it?[/quote]

I have built one near your place on Moparcraft now, I was basing the drawing of the top of my head but I’m sure it was 9x9…The new one is 20 blocks up.

I’ll have to show you when you’re on, I’ll be on for a good few hours now anyway.

edit: just remembered, I believe we had a flaw in our design the first time around, it may have been 11x11, 9x9. Heres an image of the outside:

I’m sure you can look around it yourself, bare in mind it doesn’t start instantly.

Read full topic

item.title: Today, I made something neat
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:5, topic:405359”]Can’t you also just dump water at the top and watch them die?

Also, do they actually spawn with that glass there? Or do you cover it over?[/quote]

No because the top of the structure is where the mobs spawn, with this the top levels are pitch black and the mobs drop down into the water (without the water there they would die, optional etc…).

See:

I’ve made them all drop into the room with the water because when pistons are added I’m going to create a control room where I can choose to let lava into the chamber, and change the water level, or even potentially crush them. You can even close the gap where they fall with pistons, the possibilities are endless!

A much funner way of collecting your drops, watching 30+ mobs in a small room suffer at your hands by pressing a button. None of them spawn in the bottom room, the glass was just if I ever needed to kill them all if it went wrong, I could remove the cobble from the outside manually or with pistons, kind of like a failsafe because if something went wrong I’d be screwed with all those mobs coming

The one myself and Evil_ created only has 3 levels and is already capable of filling that room to the absolute rims. You could probably get a good 10+ levels, a common mistake people make is by making their levels really wide, it takes the mobs a LONG time to find the bit where they drop down, having a lots of small levels is a lot more efficient in my view.

You can then do it multiple times to take advantage of the land mass, (excuse my horrid drawings =/)

Is basically the same as above, but spawns more, and has more space.

Read full topic

item.title: Today, I made something neat
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:2, topic:405359”]How do you get them all to spawn in there? Do you remove that torch?

Post a diagram or something?[/quote]

You basically create a mob spawning tower, except a TINY one. a few levels, as small as 9x9 20 blocks up in the air. No water currents, nothing up there but pitch black darkness, it takes 1-2 mc days to warm up but after that the mobs will come and come…

I’ve added water and the bottom of mine so they don’t die, above it there is a hole in each level (2x2) so I’m going to use pistons to control water flow etc so I can watch them all die when theres a crowd of them

update: full to the rims now, mobs are starting to glitch with the walls on all corners

Read full topic
